data.name: RPGScenery - Jungle Scene
data.detailed_description:
Far from any civilization, an abandoned path winds through huge trees reaching for the sky. The trail is intertwined with a multitude of tangled undergrowth and lianas. The air is humid and the temperature is almost unbearable. Behind every leaf lurks some new danger, yet some take the courage to visit this hidden corner of the world. At the end of the trail, somewhere deep in the jungle, an invaluable treasure has awaited its owner since ancient times. Maybe not by accident ...

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
